1.0.1.name: wordpress/guided-news-content-creation-and-marketing
1.0.1.description:
InsideMy.co Our News Content creation and Marketing plugin enables Wordpress site owners to create great marketing content! By registering and spending 5 minutes every week, you will receive a simple weekly task, that guides you what to write about, and which pictures to post. These stories will be published in your WordPress site, and you will then be able to post them easily to Facebook, Twitter and Google plus, and enhance your site's social footprint!

Creating good, engaging promotional content is hard, right? Finding what to write about, maintaining regular updates. InsideMy.co's plugin makes content creation for your business easy AND fun.

Download the InsideMy.co Our News Content Creation and Marketing WordPress Plugin today!

The plugin is completely free and takes approximately 60 seconds to install.

Easy as 1,2,3

  1. Download and install the plugin.
